TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Clock extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject

summary.span: Maintains run-time timing state for a .

span.span: Maintains run-time timing state for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A ，單獨使用時，實際上並不進行任何項目以外描述一段時間。A , by itself, doesn't actually do anything other than describe a segment of time. 它是時間軸的從事實際作業的物件： 其維持的時間軸與時間有關執行階段狀態。It's the timeline's object that does the real work: it maintains timing-related run-time state for the timeline. 在大部分情況下，時鐘會自動針對時間表建立。In most cases, a clock is created automatically for your timeline. 當您使用動畫顯示或方法中，時鐘的自動建立時間表的動畫並套用至其目標屬性。When you animate by using a or the method, clocks are automatically created for your timelines and animations and applied to their targeted properties. 如需範例，請參閱[How to： 建立屬性的動畫所使用的分鏡腳本](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-a-property-by-using-a-storyboard.md)和[如何： 以動畫顯示屬性而不使用分鏡腳本](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-a-property-without-using-a-storyboard.md)。For examples, see [How to: Animate a Property by Using a Storyboard](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-a-property-by-using-a-storyboard.md) and [How to: Animate a Property Without Using a Storyboard](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-a-property-without-using-a-storyboard.md). 您也可以建立明確地使用方法。You can also create a explicitly by using the method. 需要大量效能的情況下，例如動畫執行大量的類似物件，管理您自己使用可以提供的效能優勢。In performance-intensive scenarios, such as animating large numbers of similar objects, managing your own use can provide performance benefits. 在符合的結構的樹狀目錄中排列時鐘所建立的物件樹狀結構。Clocks are arranged in trees that match the structure of the objects tree from which they are created. 這類時間樹狀結構的根時鐘可以以互動方式操作 （暫停、 繼續、 已停止，依此類推） 藉由擷取其。The root clock of such a timing tree can be interactively manipulated (paused, resumed, stopped, and so on) by retrieving its . 無法直接控制不是根時鐘。Non-root clocks cannot be directly controlled. 一旦建立，時鐘不能修改 （但可以操作）。Once created, a clock cannot be modified (but it can be manipulated). ## 使用時間表，做為計時器Using a Timeline as a Timer 與其相關聯的事件處理常式時，時間軸的時鐘會只進度或 (如果是物件) 相關聯的屬性。A timeline's clock will only progress when there's an event handler associated with it or (in the case of an object) it is associated with a property. 因此 （和其他項目），不建議您改用做為計時器。For this reason (and others), it's not recommended that you use a as a timer.

para.span: 在衍生的類別應實作如果他們想要修改這個時鐘時間流動的方式。

span.span: Derived classes should implement if they want to modify how time flows for this clock.

para.span: 在衍生的類別，可以藉由時鐘重複、 略過、 搜尋、 開始、 暫停、 繼續，或停止透過覆寫時，執行額外的工作， ，和方法。

span.span: Derived classes can be made to do additional work when the clock repeats, skips, seeks, begins, pauses, resumes, or stops by overriding the , , and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Completed As EventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when this clock has completely finished playing.

span.span: Occurs when this clock has completely finished playing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個時鐘時鐘的樹狀結構的根時鐘，它已完成播放之後到達結束其使用中的持續期間 （其中包含重複） 和所有子系已達到其作用中的持續時間的結尾。If this clock is the root clock of a clock tree, it has completed playing after it reaches the end of its active duration (which includes repeats) and all its children have reached the end of their active durations. 如果這個時鐘子時鐘，認定為完全結束播放時所屬到達時鐘樹狀結構的根時鐘結束其使用中的持續時間和其所有子時鐘已完成播放。If this clock is a child clock, it is considered to have completely finished playing when the root clock of the clock tree to which it belongs reaches the end of its active duration and all its child clocks have finished playing. 停止時鐘不會觸發已完成的事件，但前進到其填滿期間。Stopping a clock does not trigger its completed event, but advancing it to its fill period does.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有根時鐘可以以互動方式控制。Only root clocks can be interactively controlled.

span.span: The rate at which this clock's time is current progressing, compared to real-world time.

value.span: 如果已停止時鐘，則這個屬性會傳回 。

span.span: If the clock is stopped, this property returns .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated As EventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the clock's speed is updated.

span.span: Occurs when the clock's speed is updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 暫停、 繼續、 反轉、 加速、 減速、 搜尋、 停止或變更時鐘的互動速度使用觸發此事件。Pausing, resuming, reversing, accelerating, decelerating, seeking, stopping, or changing a clock's interactive speed using a triggers this event. 雖然此事件發生時屬性會變成無效，不一定表示屬性已變更。Although this event occurs when the property becomes invalid, that doesn't necessarily mean the property changed.

The current global time for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] timing system.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentIteration As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> CurrentIteration { Nullable<int> get(); };

summary.span: Get the current iteration of this clock.

span.span: Get the current iteration of this clock.

value.span: 這個時鐘在其目前作用中期間內的 目前反覆項目或如果時鐘已停止。

span.span: This clock's current iteration within its current active period, or if this clock is stopped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時鐘的第一個反覆項目有值為 1。A clock's first iteration has a value of 1. 如果這個時鐘時間表具有設定`true`，完整的反覆項目是由正向反向組所組成，不只是下列其中一種區段。If this clock's timeline has an setting of `true`, a full iteration consists of a forward-reverse pair, not just one of these segments. 其目前的反覆項目，不論搜尋時鐘傳回其目前的反覆項目設為 1。Regardless of its current iteration, seeking a clock returns its current iteration to 1. 重新啟動時鐘也會傳回其目前的反覆項目設為 1。Restarting a clock also returns its current iteration to 1.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentProgress As Nullable(Of Double)
public: property Nullable<double> CurrentProgress { Nullable<double> get(); };

summary.span: Gets the current progress of this within its current iteration.

span.span: Gets the current progress of this within its current iteration.

value.span: 這個時鐘，0.0 這個時鐘是否在作用中或及其具有的; 否則介於 0.0 到 1.0，指出其目前的反覆項目中的這個時鐘的目前進度。

span.span: if this clock is , or 0.0 if this clock is active and its has a of ; otherwise, a value between 0.0 and 1.0 that indicates the current progress of this Clock within its current iteration.

value.span: 0.0 的值表示沒有進度，而值為 1.0 表示時鐘已在其目前的反覆項目結尾處。

span.span: A value of 0.0 indicates no progress, and a value of 1.0 indicates that the clock is at the end of its current iteration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值會指出以這個時鐘。The value of this property indicates the normalized by the of this clock's . 是時鐘具有為 1.0。A clock that is has a of 1.0. ## 使用時間表，做為計時器Using a Timeline as a Timer 與其相關聯的事件處理常式時，時間軸的時鐘會只進度或 (如果是物件) 相關聯的屬性。A timeline's clock will only progress when there's an event hander associated with it or (in the case of an object) it is associated with a property. 因此 （和其他項目），不建議您改用做為計時器。For this reason (and others), it's not recommended that you use a as a timer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意時鐘的屬性未告訴您是否已暫停。Note the clock's property doesn't tell you whether it's paused. 若要判斷是否要暫停時鐘，請使用屬性。To determine whether a clock is paused, use the property. 當這個屬性的值變更時發生。The occurs whenever the value of this property changes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CurrentStateInvalidated As EventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the clock's property is updated.

span.span: Occurs when the clock's property is updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用事件，當您想要收到通知，如果時鐘啟動時，就會停止，或填滿。Use the event when you want to be notified if when the clock starts, stops, or fills. 參數事件處理常式是驗證為無效的狀態。The parameter of the event handler is the whose state was invalidated. 暫停不會變更其。Pausing a does not change its . 若要收到通知的時鐘會變成暫停時，要使用事件。To be notified when a clock becomes paused, use the event. 雖然此事件發生時會變成無效，不一定表示變更：切換從來然後再設回在相同刻度將會引發此事件引發，但其屬性實際上不會變更。Although this event occurs when the becomes invalid, that doesn't necessarily mean the changed: a that switches from to and then back to in the same tick will cause this event to fire, but its property won't actually change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 媒體播放使用內是建立的範例會具有外部時間來源 （例如視訊剪輯） 這可能需要與其他時間軸中的同步處理。Media being played using within a is an example of creating a that would have an external time source (a video clip for example) which may require synchronization with other timelines within the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。See for more information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 修改時鐘的不會更新時鐘; 您必須建立的新時鐘從修改。Modifying a clock's does not update the clock; a new clock must be created from the modified .
